attributes.action: Reform Parliamentiary behaviour to that befitting a House of Representatives - not the bawdy "yah boo" behaviour  of unruly schoolchildren.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The behaviour witnessed regularly in The House of Commons is not only embarrassing, it is a disgraceful way to rule a nation.  Disrespectful behaviour (jeering, barraking or being in any way disruptive) should result in the Member being ejected, severly reprimanded and fined.  Our democracy is hardly perfect but a demeanour of appropriate professionalism might begin to encourage some respect in the Parliamentary system and it's representatives.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
